Description:
Title: Delivery Driver - Night Route for Micromarket RestockingJob Description:We are looking for a dedicated Delivery Driver to join our team in Dubai. As a Delivery Driver, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the timely and efficient restocking of our micromarkets with delicious food and snacks. Your primary responsibility will be to follow a designated night route to replenish our micromarkets, ensuring that they are fully stocked and ready to delight customers the next day.About Us:At Self Kiosk, we specialize in providing innovative micromarket solutions that transform workplace dining experiences. Our micromarkets offer a wide range of delectable food and beverage options, conveniently located within corporate spaces. We believe in enhancing employee satisfaction, productivity, and well-being by offering easy access to tasty and fresh choices.Responsibilities:Follow a designated night route to deliver and restock food, snacks, and beverages in our micromarkets.
Ensure accurate inventory management by tracking products delivered and restocked.
Collaborate with the operations team to maintain micromarket cleanliness and organization.
Perform routine vehicle maintenance checks to ensure the delivery car's proper functioning.
Communicate effectively with the operations team to report any issues or discrepancies.
Uphold safety standards while driving and unloading products.Benefits:Competitive salary and benefits package.
Company-provided delivery car.
Opportunity to contribute to a dynamic team in a growing industry.If you are a reliable and organized individual with a passion for ensuring our micromarkets are fully stocked and ready to serve, we would love to have you on our team. Please submit your updated resume and a brief summary of your relevant experience.Note: This position requires working night shifts and following a designated route.Skills
Skills:
Valid UAE driver's license and clean driving record.
Familiarity with the roads and routes in Dubai.
Strong organizational skills to efficiently manage deliveries and restocking.
Attention to detail to accurately track inventory and product quantities.
Time management skills to adhere to delivery schedules and meet deadlines.
Physical stamina to lift and carry packages of various sizes and weights.
Effective communication skills to report issues and collaborate with the operations team.
Positive attitude and ability to work independently.
Previous delivery or logistics experience is a plus.
